docs.lead_paragraph: An animation depicts the insertion of electrodes into the brain of a patient with severe brain injury. (Source: Cleveland Clinic) Eds note: No sound
docs.snippet: An animation depicts the insertion of electrodes into the brain of a patient with severe brain injury. (Source: Cleveland Clinic) Eds note: No sound

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the passage of air and exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide within the lungs on both a gross and microscopic level.
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the passage of air and exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide within the lungs on both a gross and microscopic level.

docs.lead_paragraph: Normal, healthy lungs are compared to the lungs of a long-term smoker.
docs.snippet: Normal, healthy lungs are compared to the lungs of a long-term smoker.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows an enlarged view of one lymph node filtering out micro-organisms from the fluid passing through.
docs.snippet: This animation shows an enlarged view of one lymph node filtering out micro-organisms from the fluid passing through.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the passage of allergens (pollen) into the nasal cavity. The body response includes the release of histamine, a chemical that produces allergy symptoms in the body.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the passage of allergens (pollen) into the nasal cavity. The body response includes the release of histamine, a chemical that produces allergy symptoms in the body.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation illustrates the organization of skeletal muscle, enlarging from a muscle belly up to its myofibrils. Simultaneously in side and front views, the actions of a leg muscle and its myofibrils are shown while performing leg extension exercises.
docs.snippet: This animation illustrates the organization of skeletal muscle, enlarging from a muscle belly up to its myofibrils. Simultaneously in side and front views, the actions of a leg muscle and its myofibrils are shown while performing leg extension...

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation depicts the inhalation of air and scent molecules from a rose into an enlarged sagittal view of the nasal cavity. The smell receptors are magnified further to show their action of relaying a neural message of “scent” to the brain.
docs.snippet: This animation depicts the inhalation of air and scent molecules from a rose into an enlarged sagittal view of the nasal cavity. The smell receptors are magnified further to show their action of relaying a neural message of “scent” to the brain.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows an enlargement of a blood capillary with red blood cells traversing through it. A section of the artery is enlarged further to display the exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide between a capillary and its surrounding tissue.
docs.snippet: This animation shows an enlargement of a blood capillary with red blood cells traversing through it. A section of the artery is enlarged further to display the exchange of oxygen and carbon dioxide between a capillary and its surrounding tissue.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animation shows the body’s response to a bee sting on the nose, giving a general description of the communication between the peripheral nervous system detecting the pain and the central nervous system issuing a reactive response.
docs.snippet: This animation shows the body’s response to a bee sting on the nose, giving a general description of the communication between the peripheral nervous system detecting the pain and the central nervous system issuing a reactive response.

docs.lead_paragraph: This animations shows sporatic brain activity and a twitching hand that occur with Parkinson's disease, followed by treatment with dopamine stimulation.
docs.snippet: This animations shows sporatic brain activity and a twitching hand that occur with Parkinson's disease, followed by treatment with dopamine stimulation.
